product.title: Origin Matt Red - Venetian Blind
product.description: Brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating cords. You'll love the effect the matt red has on an all-white contemporary kitchen, where it can be beautifully complemented by silver fixtures and fittings such as taps, cupboard handles, and the like.

relproducts.title: Valencia Simplicity Red Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This red roller blind is so vibrant with its hot scarlet colour. Think of a post box but much brighter. Red is for passion and there's no mistaking the raciness of this blind. Red is a popular accent colour in kitchens and studies, this may just be what you've been looking for this red roller blind is so vibrant with its hot scarlet colour.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Scarlet Red Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bold scarlet red roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Scarlett Red
relproducts.description: Stirloscarlett red plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.description: Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. relproducts.title: Sevilla Blackout Vivid Red Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This sevilla vivid red roller blind really is a striking option to brighten up your dcor. Its got more than a little personality too. Use it to keep your home funky and vibrant alongside darker tones or mix it in with bright oranges or yellows for a theme that screams warmth this sevilla vivid red roller blind really is a striking option to brighten up your dcor.

relproducts.title: Origin Basic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

relproducts.title: Origin Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

relproducts.title: Origin Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Dark slate in colour, the origin grey is comprised of satin-finish, heavy gauge aluminium slats, high quality pull-cords, and a clear wand tilt, resulting in a streamlined, contemporary blind. Given that the grey shade will match a multitude of hues, this is an obvious choice for those who like to change their dcor often. Go industrial in the kitchen by pairing the grey with worn metals, rustic woods, and slate floor tiles.

relproducts.title: Origin Ultramarine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin ultra marine is a stand-out blue blind, with a gloss finish on strong aluminium slats. Made from only high quality materials, from the slats right through to the pull-cords, this blind is made for durability and hardiness. Take your bathroom to the seaside by coupling with pale, icy blues and pure, bright whites; or give a plain, neutral hallway or utility room a big splash of dazzling colour, offset by whites and silvers in ornaments, frames, and fittings.

relproducts.title: Origin Mocha - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and rich, the satin-finish origin mocha is a luxury-lover's dream. Work the adjustable slats to your heart's content, either to let the light in or keep it out, without worrying about over-use, as this durable aluminium blind is built to last. Streamline your kitchen by taking advantage of the mocha's colour-coordinated slats, cords, and rails, and pair with deeper browns or pretty turquoises to craft a refreshing and inspiring colour scheme that your guests won't be able to resist commenting on.

relproducts.title: Origin Hunter Green - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Dark and unusual, the origin in hunter green offers a perfect satin finish on slim aluminium slats, within a matching frame, and controlled using coordinating pull-cords, making this the perfect blind for both pleasure and function. For a country aesthetic with a modern twist, work the hunter green into a warm kitchen colour scheme, complementing with terracottas, soft yellows, and creams. Or make a real statement in a contemporary living room by placing it against white walls and light-coloured woods.

relproducts.title: Origin City Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

relproducts.description: Persia satin metal venetian blind.

relproducts.title: Primary Red
relproducts.description: Primary red gloss metal venetian blind.

relproducts.title: Ruby Red Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

relproducts.title: Scarlet Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: The scarlet venetian blind has a red metallic finish to it, helping make this blind something special. Use this alongside light and neutral colours to help make this blind standout in your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

relproducts.title: Rich Red Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Juicy Berry Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: The rich pink colour of the juicy berry venetian blind is striking and beautiful. The strong pink tone is slightly darker than a barbie pink, so can be used in more rooms than you might think. Pair this with creams or greys to really compliment this bold colour. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.
